profileinfo.inforDetails_1: Enter your full legal name as it appears on your official identification.
profileinfo.inforDetails_2: This information is required to verify your age and provide age-appropriate services.
profileinfo.inforDetails_3: Select your gender from the options.
profileinfo.inforDetails_4: Please provide a valid email address that you have access to.
profileinfo.inforDetails_5: Please provide a valid phone number where we can reach you if needed.
profileinfo.inforDetails_6: Your account type determines the features and privileges you will have on this platform.
profileinfo.addressInfo_1: Enter the primary line of your physical address,typically including your house or building number and street name.
profileinfo.addressInfo_2: This field is optional and can be used to provide any additional address details, such as apartment number,suite, floor, or any other relevant information.
profileinfo.cityInfo: Enter the name of the city or locality where your address is located.
profileinfo.stateInfo: Please select your state or province from the provided list.
profileinfo.zipInfo: Enter the postal code or ZIP code associated with your address

passwordReset.currentPassword: Enter your current password to verify your identity.
passwordReset.createNew: Create a new password for your account.
passwordReset.passwordReq_1: Passwords must be at least 8 characters long.
passwordReset.passwordReq_2: Include at least one numeric digit (0-9).
passwordReset.reEnter: Please re-enter the new password you've just chosen.

identityVerification.instruction1: Your document security is important to us. All files uploaded through this portal are securely stored.
identityVerification.instruction2: Acceptable formats: PDF, JPG, JPEG, PNG.
identityVerification.instruction3: Each file size should not exceed 5 MB.
identityVerification.instruction4: Documents must be clear and legible.
identityVerification.instruction5: Must be a government-issued identity card.
identityVerification.identityProofinstr: BOTH FILES ARE MANDATORY. If your document includes both the front and back sides in a single file, please upload the same file in both fields.
identityVerification.uploadId: Upload the front side of your ID
identityVerification.idBack: Upload the back side of your ID.
identityVerification.addressProof: Please Upload a document to verify Your Proof of Address
identityVerification.frontSide: Upload the front side of your ID

viewIdentityComponent.personalInfo: Your personal info is stored here and will only be visible to you.

notification.emailInfo: To reduce interruptions, email notifications are bundled and delivered when you're not actively using your device.
notification.notificationPermission: We'd like to request your browser's permission to display notifications.

emptyState.createNewAccount: Please create a new MT5 Live account to get started.

market.marketDesc: Welcome to our Live Market Currency Rates widget! This powerful tool allows you to stay updated with the latest forex market trends.Whether you're a trader or just exploring market trends, this user-friendly widget ensures you have the data you need at your fingertips
market.calenderDesc: Explore our real-time Economic Calendar to track global financial events and indicators. Get insights into key economic data, including forecasts, actuals, and historical trends, to make informed trading and investment decisions. Perfect for traders, investors, and market enthusiasts!
market.newsDesc: Stay ahead in the Forex market with our real-time newsfeed. Get the latest updates, market analysis, and breaking news from the world of Forex trading. Covering economic events, currency fluctuations, and expert insights, our newsfeed keeps you informed about the trends and opportunities shaping the financial markets.
market.glossaryDesc: Explore our detailed Forex Glossary, a complete guide to essential trading terms and concepts. From technical indicators like RSI and MACD to financial terms like bid/ask spread, leverage, and volatility, this glossary is designed to help traders of all levels enhance their understanding of the Forex market.

ibprofile.referalReady: Your exclusive referral link is ready !
ibprofile.referalReady2: Share this link to invite potential clients to register under your supervision and start their trading journey.
ibprofile.transferHistoryDesc: This is your transfer history. View all your previous transfer activities here.
